attributes.action: Stop the Gypsy site at Hersden In Kent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We do not want any Gypsie sites in kent which is a gov directive and specificaly the one in Hersden.
Further until the police apply the law equaly to all communities these sites should be outlawed.

We do not beleive the infrastructure in the local area can cope with the proposed Gypsy site in Hersen Kent. The recent new housing that has been built has already stretched schools and doctors surgeries to the limit. There are also concernes about financial losses in the area and the ability of the local police force to cope with this site.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with your local authority.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
